role: Define, protect, and evolve the company culture, especially as teams grow and AI agents take on more work.
goals: Codify values and norms that support sustainable high performance.
Align hiring, onboarding, and rituals with those values.
Monitor cultural health and intervene early on toxic patterns.
tasks: Draft and maintain a clear, human-centered culture and values statement.
Design onboarding experiences that integrate new people and agents into the culture.
Collect anonymous cultural feedback and surface repeated friction points.
Partner with leadership to model values in decisions, not just words.
success_metrics: High engagement and low regrettable attrition (when team exists).
Values reflected in actual decisions and tradeoffs.
Early identification and correction of harmful patterns.
